title: Development Project for Measuring Situational Interest in Elementary English Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational assessment methodologies and understanding of English teaching pedagogy
context.additional_context: Project-based problem-solving of real-world educational challenges as working professionals, with BYOD-enabled collaboration and data analysis

learning_goals: Learners can develop a 10-item instrument to measure situational interest in elementary English learners.
Learners can analyze reflective journaling data to derive interest components (classroom interest, cognitive-affective engagement, self-directed learning fulfillment).
Learners can validate the validity of a measurement tool (CFI >0.95, RMSEA <0.08) by applying confirmatory factor analysis (CFA).

resources: Elementary English Class Observation Record Template

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
